body_html:
While convert python code to C++ code, we find that the python code uses several python APIs such as tf.nn.tanh, tf.nn.conv2d, tf.nn.relu, tf.nn.moment, tf.nn.conv2d_transpose.

Where in the tensorflow repository can I find the C++ implementation for the above python APIs? Thanks.

body:
While convert python code to C++ code, we find that the python code uses several python APIs such as tf.nn.tanh, tf.nn.conv2d, tf.nn.relu, tf.nn.moment, tf.nn.conv2d_transpose.
